reference.shortdesc: The codeph element identifies a code snippet.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The codeph is specialized from ph. It is defined in the programming domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the codeph element identifies a code snippet. The code snippet will be rendered in-line in the paragraph.
example.codeblock: The second line of the sample program code, Do forever, represents the start of a loop construct.
